item.title: The Must-Watch Smartphones of 2025: iPhone SE 4, Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim, Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold & more - CNBCTV18
item.description:
The Must-Watch Smartphones of 2025: iPhone SE 4, Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim, Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold & more

Date: 2023-10-01 Source: CNBC TV18

The smartphone spotlight in 2025 will shine on key models from major brands, featuring innovative designs and upgraded technology.

  • iPhone SE 4: Expected to feature an edge-to-edge screen, 48MP rear camera, and AI enhancements.
  • iPhone 17 'Air': Rumored to be Apple's thinnest iPhone, featuring a 6.6-inch display and a sleek new design.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 'Slim': An experimental model focused on thinness without sacrificing flagship features.
  • Galaxy Z Flip7 FE: A more affordable version of the Flip7, retaining flexible display features at a lower price point.
  • OnePlus Open 2: Anticipated improvements in hinge technology and battery life, following the success of the original Open.
  • Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: Expected to feature the Tensor G5 chip and deeper AI integration, enhancing productivity and entertainment.
“If Samsung strikes the right balance, the Flip7 FE could make foldable devices more accessible to the masses.”

Consumers can look forward to a diverse range of smartphones capturing attention in 2025, with major brands pushing boundaries in design and functionality.

item.title: Nothing phones running Nothing OS 3.0 get Circle to Search AI feature - India Today
item.description:
Nothing Phones Now Support Circle to Search AI Feature

Published On: Dec 27, 2024 by Aman Rashid

Nothing has announced that the Circle to Search feature is now available on their Phone 2, Phone 2a, and Phone 2a Plus devices running Nothing OS 3.0, which is based on Android 15.

  • The feature was first launched in early 2024 and has now expanded to include Nothing devices.
  • Users can enable Circle to Search through Settings, and it works with both gesture and traditional navigation.
  • The tool allows users to search for items on their screen by drawing a circle around them, streamlining the search process.
  • Upcoming enhancements include the ability to search within videos and identifying songs.
This makes searching easier and faster for everyday tasks.

This new addition to Nothing's software lineup enhances user experience by providing quick access to information directly from the screen.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 available with massive discount - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 available with massive discount

Date: December 27, 2024
Source: India Today

The Samsung Galaxy S24 is being offered at a substantial discount on Amazon India, significantly lowering its price from the initial launch cost.

  • The smartphone launched in India starting at Rs 79,999.
  • Current price on Amazon India is Rs 50,999, offering a discount of Rs 29,000.
  • Additional discount up to Rs 22,800 is available for trade-ins.
  • The 256GB storage variant is priced at Rs 59,499.
  • Available in four colors: Amber Yellow, Cobalt Violet, Marble Grey, and Onyx Black.
  • Features a 6.4-inch display, 48-megapixel camera, 120Hz refresh rate, and S-Pen support.
  • Powered by Samsung Exynos 2400 SoC and includes a 4,000mAh battery.
“Samsung Galaxy S24 is available at a starting price of Rs 50,999 on Amazon India.”

This discount on the Samsung Galaxy S24 makes it an attractive option for consumers seeking high-performance smartphones at a reduced price.

item.title: Lava Yuva 2 5G smartphone with 50MP camera, 5000 mAh battery launched: Price, specs and more - The Times of India
item.description:

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

The Lava Yuva 2 5G smartphone has been launched, boasting a 50MP camera and a robust 5000 mAh battery, catering to tech enthusiasts and everyday users alike.

  • 50MP rear camera for high-quality photography.
  • Powered by a 5000 mAh battery for extended usage.
  • Supports 5G connectivity for faster internet speeds.
  • Available at competitive pricing.
  • Features and specifications aimed at enhancing user experience.
"The Lava Yuva 2 5G aims to bring high-end specifications to a budget-friendly market."

This launch reflects the growing trend of manufacturing high-performance smartphones at affordable prices, making advanced technology accessible to a larger audience.

item.title: Oppo A5 Pro launched with MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC: All details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Oppo A5 Pro Launched with MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC: Key Features and Details

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Oppo A5 Pro is a new mid-range smartphone launched in China, featuring impressive specifications and a stylish design aimed at providing durability and performance.

Oppo A5 Pro Specifications and Features

  • 6.7-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC with up to 12GB RAM
  • Storage options up to 512GB UFS 3.1
  • IP69, IP68, and IP66 dust and water resistance ratings
  • 50MP main camera with OIS and 2MP monochrome camera, plus a 16MP selfie camera
  • 6000mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC fast charging
  • Runs on ColorOS 15 based on Android 15

Oppo A5 Pro Price and Availability

The Oppo A5 Pro will be available in four colors: New Year Red, Quartz White, Rock Black, and Sandstone Purple. Pricing starts at CNY 1,999 for the 8GB + 256GB variant, with options up to CNY 2,499 for higher specifications. Pre-orders are live, and sales start on December 27, 2024.

item.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaks: Flagship smartphone tipped to debut in February 2025 - what to expect - Mint
item.description:
Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaks: Flagship smartphone tipped to debut in February 2025 - what to expect

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

Tech giant Xiaomi is reportedly gearing up to unveil its highly anticipated Xiaomi 15 Ultra in China by February 2025. According to leaks from Digital Chat Station on Weibo, the flagship smartphone is expected to debut on 28 February 2025.

  • The Xiaomi 15 Ultra will join the Xiaomi 15 series, launched in October, which includes the Xiaomi 15 and Xiaomi 15 Pro.
  • It is rumored to feature Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 50MP triple-camera system.
  • Potentially noteworthy is a 200MP telephoto sensor with 4.3x optical zoom.
  • Advanced imaging capabilities, upgraded macro sensor, and larger aperture for enhanced low-light performance are also expected.
  • It will reportedly come with IP68 and IP69 certifications for dust and water resistance and wireless charging capabilities.
  • Similar to its series counterparts, it may ship with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0 and maintain a 5,000mAh battery.
  • Speculation for an India launch is strong, potentially in March 2025, with expected pricing around ₹99,999 for a model with 16GB RAM and 512GB storage.

Xiaomi has not confirmed these details, but leaks indicate that the Xiaomi 15 Ultra could set a new benchmark in flagship smartphone technology.

item.title: One UI 7 Update Lets Users Turn Off Annoying ‘Super HDR’ Content on Galaxy Devices: Report - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung May Let Users Disable This Annoying Feature With One UI 7

Date: October 2024, Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung announced its Android 15-based update, One UI 7, addressing a long-standing issue with bright HDR content on devices. The update includes a new toggle for the Super HDR feature, allowing users to prevent automatic brightness adjustments.

Key Points:

  • The update brings a new Super HDR toggle in the Settings app.
  • Turning off the toggle stops the device from increasing brightness for HDR content.
  • Currently available for Galaxy S24 users as part of the beta program.
  • The beta is initially accessible in several countries, including Germany and the US.
  • Supports 29 global languages, expanding accessibility for users.

Notable Quotes:

“Automatically adjust the display to show the full range of colors and contrast in pictures taken with Galaxy devices.” - Mishaal Rahman, Android Authority

Samsung's One UI 7 is a significant step forward for user control over HDR content display.

item.title: Xiaomi teases its first 2025 smartphone: Here's what it may launch - The Times of India
item.description:
Xiaomi teases its first 2025 smartphone: Here's what it may launch

Publication Date: October 15, 2023

Source: Tech News Daily

Xiaomi has provided sneak peeks at its highly anticipated smartphone lineup for 2025, showcasing innovative features and designs that are expected to make a significant impact in the tech world.

  • The smartphone is rumored to include cutting-edge AI capabilities.
  • New design elements aim to enhance user experience and appeal.
  • Xiaomi focuses on sustainability in its manufacturing process.
  • The launch event is set for early 2025, generating buzz among tech enthusiasts.
“We are committed to pushing the boundaries of technology and design with our upcoming smartphone lineup for 2025,” said a Xiaomi spokesperson.

This new smartphone from Xiaomi is anticipated to not only compete with existing leaders in the market but also to set new standards in the industry.

item.title: Chinese AI firm releases DeepSeek V3, a new leader in open-source AI models - The Hindu
item.description:
Chinese AI firm releases DeepSeek V3, a new leader in open-source AI models

Published - December 27, 2024 02:00 pm IST

Chinese firm DeepSeek has released a new open-source model, DeepSeek V3, which outperforms existing leading open-source models and closed models like OpenAI’s GPT-4o on several benchmarks.

  • The AI model has 671 billion parameters, allowing it to generate text, code, and perform related tasks.
  • Utilizes a mixture of experts (MoE) architecture to optimize task performance and reduce hardware costs.
  • Training cost was approximately $5.57 million and took 2788K H800 GPU hours.
  • DeepSeek V3 surpassed other models including Llama-3.1-405B and Qwen 2.5-72B on most benchmarks.
  • Currently available on GitHub under the company’s model license.
“The model surpassed open-source models including the Llama-3.1-405B and Qwen 2.5-72B on most benchmarks.”

In conclusion, DeepSeek V3 is set to be a significant player in the AI field, challenging established models with impressive efficiency and capability.

item.title: YouTube working on 'Play Something' feature for mobile app: What is it - Business Standard
item.description:
YouTube Introduces 'Play Something' Feature for Mobile Users

Date: Dec 27 2024 | Source: Business Standard

Google's YouTube is testing a new 'Play Something' feature, allowing the app to play videos selected based on user preferences.

  • The 'Play Something' button appears as a floating action button in the YouTube app's latest beta version for Android.
  • It replaces the minimized video player and plays a suggested video tailored to the user's preferences when tapped.
  • This feature supports both YouTube Shorts and regular videos in a portrait orientation.
  • YouTube has previously introduced other experimental features, including AI-generated audio for creators.
"The Play Something button starts playing a video that has been selected by YouTube, taking the user's video preference into account."

This new feature aims to enhance user engagement by personalizing the video-watching experience directly from the mobile app.

item.title: Samsung may launch Galaxy Ring 2 alongside the Galaxy S25 series at January's Unpacked event - The Times of India
item.description:
Samsung may launch Galaxy Ring 2 alongside the Galaxy S25 series at January's Unpacked event

Publication Date: January 2024

Source: Tech News Daily

Rumors suggest that Samsung is planning to unveil the Galaxy Ring 2, a new wearable device, concurrently with the Galaxy S25 series at their January Unpacked event, marking an exciting new entry into the wearable market.

  • Galaxy Ring 2 expected to feature advanced health tracking capabilities.
  • The launch aligns with the release of the Galaxy S25 series.
  • Industry analysts anticipate increased competition in the health technology space.
“The Galaxy Ring 2 could redefine how wearables contribute to personal health management.”

This potential launch highlights Samsung's ongoing commitment to expanding its wearable technology ecosystem and could significantly impact the market landscape for health-focused devices.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim May Use New ALoP Technology for Compact Camera Module, Better Image Quality - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim May Use New ALoP Technology for Camera

Publication Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S25 Slim, which will feature the newly announced ALoP (All Lenses on Prism) technology for its telephoto camera, aiming for a thinner device without sacrificing image quality. Leaks suggest that the phone will have a periscope telephoto camera that minimizes the camera bump.

  • The ALoP technology reduces camera module thickness by 22% compared to traditional designs.
  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is expected to measure less than 7mm thick.
  • It will feature a triple rear camera setup including a 200-megapixel ISOCELL HP5 sensor.
  • The Galaxy S25 series, including the S25 Slim, is set to be unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 23, with pre-orders starting January 24.
“Confirmed ✅ The S25 Slim features ALoP technology. This allows for a reduction in the thickness of the camera bump.” – Jukanlosreve

The use of ALoP technology is seen as a significant development in smartphone camera design, promising a sleeker profile for future devices.

item.title: Redmi 14C 5G launching in India on January 6 - FoneArena
item.description:
Redmi 14C 5G Launches in India on January 6

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: FoneArena

Xiaomi has confirmed the global and India launch of the Redmi 14C 5G smartphone on January 6th, following the introduction of the 4G version back in September.

  • The Redmi 14C 5G will support dual 5G SIM with speeds up to 2.5Gbps.
  • Features a 6.88” HD+ 120Hz display and powered by Snapdragon 4 Gen 2.
  • Offers a 13MP rear camera and a 5MP front camera, with a 5160mAh battery supporting 18W fast charging.
  • Will be available on Flipkart, mi.com, and offline stores after launch.

Xiaomi is also preparing to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 tablet in India on January 10th.

item.title: ChatGPT Search Can Be Manipulated To Spread False Information, Warns Study - Times Now
item.description:
ChatGPT Search Can Be Manipulated To Spread False Information, Warns Study

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: The Guardian

A study reveals ChatGPT Search's susceptibility to manipulation, including generating misleading summaries and malicious outputs through hidden text.

  • ChatGPT Search can create misleading summaries for topics based on manipulated content.
  • The tool can produce harmful code and favorable product reviews despite negative feedback.
  • Researchers exploited AI's tendencies to generate biased outputs by using hidden text.
  • The incident highlights the need for more accountable AI systems and user awareness.
“This incident goes on to show that state-of-the-art technologies aren't without fault.”

With the increasing integration of AI in daily internet use, stronger safety measures are essential to prevent misuse and ensure credibility.

item.title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Launch Timeline Tipped; Said to Get Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC - Gadgets 360
item.description:

Source: Gadgets 360

Xiaomi Mix Flip, launched in July 2023, is rumored to have a follow-up model, the Mix Flip 2, potentially debuting in early 2025 with upgraded features.

  • Possible updates include Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Current model, Mix Flip, includes Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 with high-end display specs.

The incoming Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 aims to enhance the current features while maintaining popularity among foldable smartphone enthusiasts.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G launched in India at Rs.13999- Check out specs, features, and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G launched with MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and 5500mAh battery

Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Vivo has launched its new affordable Y-series smartphone, the Vivo Y29 5G in India at a starting price of just Rs.13999. The smartphone features a slimmer profile and attractive design, making it stand out.

  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor
  • 6.68-inch LCD display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • 50MP dual rear camera with AI camera features
  • 5500mAh battery with 44W fast charging
  • IP64 rating for dust and water resistance
  • Available in Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black
“If you are in search of budget options for feature-filled smartphones, then check out what the new Vivo Y29 5G has to offer under Rs.15000.”

The Vivo Y29 5G combines affordability with premium features, making it a compelling choice for consumers looking for budget smartphones.

item.title: Lava Yuva 2 budget 5G phone launched with backlight design: Price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Lava Yuva 2 budget 5G phone launched with backlight design: Price, specs

Last Updated: Dec 27 2024 | Source: Business Standard

The Lava Yuva 2 5G smartphone is designed with a unique backlight feature that blinks for calls and notifications. It comes equipped with modern specifications at an affordable price.

  • Price: Rs 9,499
  • Available Colors: Marble Black, Marble White
  • Processor: Unisoc T760
  • RAM: 4GB (expandable with virtual RAM)
  • Storage: 128GB
  • Display: 6.67-inch HD+, 90Hz refresh rate
  • Rear Camera: 50MP + 2MP
  • Front Camera: 8MP
  • Battery: 5000mAh with 18W charging
"The smartphone features a punch-hole design display and a dual-camera set-up at the back with artificial intelligence-powered imaging features."

In conclusion, Lava has introduced an appealing budget smartphone aimed at providing essential features and stylish design to the consumers.

item.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra with Snapdragon 8 Elite chip tipped to launch in February: Here is everything we know so far - India Today

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is expected to debut in China on February 28, 2025, equipped with the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and advanced camera features.

  • Launch date set for February 28, 2025, in China.
  • Will include a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • Features a 50-megapixel primary camera, upgraded macro sensor, and improved low-light capabilities.
  • Expected to launch with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0.

item.title: The Best Air Purifier in India: What Sets It Apart - ABOUT INSIDER
item.description:
The Best Air Purifier in India: What Sets It Apart

Published on: Not specified Source: Not specified

Indoor air pollution is a silent yet pervasive threat to our health. With rising concerns over air quality, choosing the best air purifier in India has become essential.

  • Combat Indoor Pollutants: Effectively tackles harmful particles.
  • Protect Against Allergies: Reduces triggers like pet dander and pollen.
  • Improve Respiratory Health: Ensures cleaner air for better lung function.
  • Odour Elimination: Filters out unpleasant smells.

Air purifiers are investments in health, enhancing sleep quality and providing peace of mind.

item.title: Zupee Brings Innovation to Gaming with Blockchain Solutions - BusinessLine
item.description:
Zupee Brings Innovation to Gaming with Blockchain Solutions

Updated - December 27, 2024 by The Hindu Business Line

Zupee, a leading name in skill-based gaming, is transforming the gaming industry by integrating blockchain technology into its platform, enhancing security, fairness, and transparency.

  • Zupee utilizes a tamper-proof Random Number Generator (RNG) powered by blockchain for unbiased game outcomes.
  • All game results are recorded on an immutable ledger, allowing players to independently verify results.
  • The platform complies with Indian regulatory standards by publishing RNG data on the blockchain.
  • Blockchain technology enhances security, ensuring player data is protected and disputes are easily resolved.
  • This integration represents a significant advancement in the online gaming industry, fostering trust and empowering players.
“By prioritizing fairness, transparency, security, and player empowerment, the platform has set new standards for what gamers can expect.”

Zupee's innovation signifies a shift towards a more transparent and secure gaming experience, influencing the future of the gaming industry.

item.title: WhatsApp Introduces Document Scanning Feature, But Only For iPhone Users For Now - News18
item.description:
WhatsApp Introduces Document Scanning Feature Exclusively for iPhone Users

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: News18

WhatsApp has rolled out a new document scanning feature for its iOS users, eliminating the need for third-party apps for document scanning, with plans to extend it to Android users soon.

  • The new feature allows users to scan documents directly within WhatsApp, enhancing the user experience.
  • Users must update to the latest version of WhatsApp to access this feature.
  • The feature works by opening a chat, selecting ‘Documents’, and then scanning directly from the app.
“This feature is especially useful for those who want to share files quickly while on the go.”

WhatsApp continues to innovate with features that cater to its vast user base, further enhancing the platform's functionality.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 series design details confirmed: Price, specs and all we know ahead of launch - India Today
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Design Details Confirmed: Price, Specs and All We Know Ahead of Launch

Published On: Dec 27, 2024
Source: Nandini Yadav

Oppo is set to launch its Reno 13 series next month, with design details and expected features already revealed via teasers.

Key Points:

  • The Reno 13 series includes the Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro, expected to launch in January 2025.
  • Design features iPhone-like camera setup with large vertical lenses.
  • Available colors include white and lavender, with a sculpted glass back.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, with a 6.59-inch AMOLED display.
  • The series boasts a 50-megapixel primary camera and a 50-megapixel front camera.
  • Pricing in China starts at CNY 2,699, approximately Rs 31,400.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“We are already feeling a little inclined towards the lavender colorway.”

Conclusion:

The Oppo Reno 13 series promises significant upgrades in design and features, building on its predecessor's success as it prepares for its Indian launch.

item.title: Samsung to preview Galaxy Ring 2, smart glasses at S25 series launch event - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung to Preview Galaxy Ring 2 and Smart Glasses at Upcoming Event

Publication Date: January 22, 2025

Source: 9To5Google

Samsung is set to showcase its second-generation Galaxy Ring and new smart glasses during the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025, alongside the Galaxy S25 series smartphones.

  • Samsung Galaxy Ring 2 will feature enhanced health sensors and improved battery life.
  • A new smart glass device based on the Android XR platform will be unveiled, likely incorporating Google’s Gemini AI assistant for various functionalities.
  • The smart glasses may include a built-in 12MP camera and will be powered by Qualcomm's AR1 chip.
  • Project Moohan XR headset is also anticipated to be revealed, designed in collaboration with Google and Qualcomm, featuring advanced displays and multi-modal input.
“The Galaxy Ring 2 will offer better health sensors and improved battery life.”

This event marks an exciting preview of Samsung's latest innovation in wearable technology, expanding its ecosystem in the health and smart glasses domain.

item.title: Top Tech News: Nothing Phone 3a Models to Debut with Qualcomm Chips; Chennai Startup Secures $8M for Local Chip Innovation Drive - Analytics Insight
item.description:
Top Tech News: Nothing Phone 3a Models to Debut with Qualcomm Chips; Chennai Startup Secures $8M for Local Chip Innovation Drive

Published on: 27 Dec 2024, 6:31 am

Here’s a quick rundown of the biggest tech headlines making waves today. From the Nothing Phone 3a Models to AAI Opens 2024 Recruitment, let’s dive into the top tech stories of the day.

Nothing Phone 3a Models to Debut with Qualcomm Chips

British tech brand Nothing is set to expand its smartphone lineup in 2025 with four models: the flagship Nothing Phone 3, Nothing Phone 3a, Phone 3a Plus, and CMF Phone 2. The Phone 3a and 3a Plus will feature Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chips, introducing telephoto cameras and eSIM support.

Chennai Startup Secures $8M for Local Chip Innovation Drive

Chennai-based Mindgrove Technologies has raised $8 million in a Series A funding round to support the commercial production of its Secure IoT microcontroller SoC.

AAI Opens 2024 Recruitment for Graduate/Diploma Apprentices

The Airport Authority of India is inviting applications for 24 Graduate/Diploma Apprentices with competitive stipends.

Russian Companies Turn to Crypto for Cross-Border Payments

Russian businesses are increasingly adopting cryptocurrencies for international transactions amidst sanction circumventions.

How AI has Transformed Smartphone Market Globally, But Are We Ready?

With over 6.6 billion smartphone users worldwide, AI has significantly influenced mobile device functionality and personalization.
